page.title: 03 HOUSING IN SOUTH-AYR
page.content: This block can be split into 8 main areas:-{Castlehill, Belmont, Forehill, {Masonhill, Kincaidston, Alloway,} {Doonfoot, and Seafield. { }Castlehill, Belmont and Forehill are high density estates, mainly made up of council houses, some of which have been bought by tenants. Kincaidston is a very new, very high density council estate. The terraced houses are built in squares within squares. Masonhill, Alloway, Doonfoot and Seafield consist of privately owned houses. Apart from the original village of Alloway, the houses in Masonhill and Alloway are post-war, while Doonfoot and Seafield have older and usually bigger houses.
